snippet.title: ARC Raiders - Wish I Knew Sooner | Tips, Tricks, & Game Knowledge for New Players
snippet.description:
Try Rocket Money for free: https://RocketMoney.com/legacygaming 

Just starting out in ARC Raiders...or are you already well on your way to dominating the topside? Well never fear, your friends at Legacy Gaming have tons of tricks to help you take on enemy raiders and dominate the wastelands. We share our favorite gameplay tips and tricks that will help you understand the game and set you on the right path to surviving in Embark Studio's new third-person extraction shooter, ARC Raiders.

2:35 Match Essentials
4:50 XP Tips
5:54 Rocket Money
7:01 Parkour & Traversal
9:12 Essential Gadgets
10:39 Down But Not Out
12:07 Critical Teamplay Advice
14:05 Sound Is Everything
16:04 Make Use Of Melee Weapons
17:13 Beware of Traps & Alerts
18:47 Going In With A Goal
20:23 Night Raids & Keys
21:05 Subscribe For More ARC Raiders
